item_name: B&B Charcoal All Natural Oak Lump Charcoal 20 lb

What remains is only the natural fiber, accounting for the subtle, natural flavor that foods capture when cooked with B&B Lump Charcoal. That process has made it “The Expert’s Choice For the Outdoor Barbequer” for many years.

item_name: Weber Steel Chimney Starter 12.7 in. L X 8.1 in. W For Weber
full_product_description: The durable, aluminized steel Weber Rapidfire Chimney Starter allows you to light charcoal briquettes quickly and evenly. The large-capacity, ventilated chimney is uniquely constructed to enable airflow, exposing more briquettes and reducing ignition time. It features a unique, cone-shaped bottom grate that exposes more surface area of the coals to flame for fast and even lighting. The large bottom chamber is easy to fill with lighter cubes or fire starter of your choice and this chimney starter includes two handles for optimal control. When coals are hot, grab the thermoplastic handle with one hand and the top, wire handle with your other hand to direct fuel exactly where you want it. The heat shield reduces heat transfer to handle, but you should still wear gloves when chimney is hot. To get started, simply place chimney starter over a lighter cube or crumpled newspaper, light your preferred fire starter, and you're well on your way. Fast, simple, and no lighter fuel required.
product_category: Ace Hardware > Outdoor Living > Grills and Smokers > Charcoal Starters

Digital controls and Wi-Fi and Bluetooth connectivity let you monitor and control remotely from the WEBER CONNECT app. Add steel tables (sold separately) for extra space. A large cooking capacity lets you cook on two levels simultaneously; remove the 9.5"" top rack to create a 11.5"" tall space for larger foods. The side hopper fits a 20-pound bag and the fuel gauge shows current pellet level and sends you notifications when it is low. Experience continuous pellet flow for up to 20 hours of remote cooking. Grill also has a Pull-and-Clean Grease Management System, porcelain-enameled lid, and built-in handle. The easy-access maintenance panel is straightforward to troubleshoot, if necessary.   * *Based on lab conditions of 77 degrees ambient temperature with premium hardwood pellet fuel
product_category: Ace Hardware > Outdoor Living > Grills and Smokers > Pellet Grills

full_product_description: Keep your Searwood XL 600 looking great. This durable Premium Grill Cover means you don't have to fear the elements. It's weather-resistant and comes with fastening straps to help keep it secure even in the harshest conditions.

item_name: Gozney Arc XL, Liquid Propane Outdoor Pizza Oven Bone
full_product_description: Arc XL is the world’s most thoughtfully designed compact outdoor pizza oven. Expertly engineered and designed down to the last detail, a favorite for Gozney’s Pizza Collective professional team and effortless for beginners, reaching temperatures in excess of 950 degrees Fahrenheit so you can cook pizza in 60 seconds. Arc XL introduces a new state-of the-art rolling gas flame that reaches across the oven whilst holding its heat, so you can experience restaurant quality pizza with unparalleled consistency. Create any style of pie with intuitive flame control, uniform cooking heat, and more room to maneuver pizza all for a consistent bake. Arc is ready to cook right out of the box, ready for all kinds of pizza adventures. Arc XL brings the powerful performance of our industry leading commercial pizza ovens to your outdoors, easily and quickly hit temperatures in 20 minutes. With Arc you can experience restaurant quality pizza and the joy of high-temperature cooking all through a beautiful backyard accent that brings people together.
product_category: Ace Hardware > Outdoor Living > Grills and Smokers > Pizza Ovens

item_name: Weber Slate 36" Rust-Resistant 4 Burner Liquid Propane Digital Thermometer Outdoor Griddle Black 36 IN
full_product_description: Have more fun griddling on the game-changing, black 36"" Rust-Resistant Weber Slate outdoor griddle, featuring a large, pre-seasoned carbon-steel cooktop that's ready to cook on right out of the box and stays ready, not rusty use after use. The four 48,000 BTU burners heat up rapidly and maintain consistent temperatures across the cooking surface for reliable, delicious results.  *  * The gas griddle's digital display lets you easily keep an eye on the surface temperature. Now you can create crispy smashed burgers and bacon, beautifully browned pancakes and paninis, flavorful fajitas and stir fries, and more. Plus, with the Weber Works interchangeable cook, prep, and store system, you can keep outdoor cooking and cleaning supplies close at hand, carry food and condiments from the kitchen to the propane griddle, convert the side table into a prep station, and stow gear in tightly sealed containers (accessories sold separately).
product_category: Ace Hardware > Outdoor Living > Grills and Smokers > Gas Grills

item_name: Recteq B380X Bullseye Deluxe 380 Wood Pellet WiFi Grill and Smoker Black/Silver
full_product_description: There is nothing hotter than our newest grilling innovation- the RT-B380X Bullseye Deluxe takes our weekday workhorse into a weekday warrior. Finally, all of the latest smart grill features you have been waiting for: dual band WiFi connectivity, PID control, and, of course, extreme temperature capabilities. This new design features an integrated front-folding shelf, one probe port, and an 18 lb hopper. Convenience features like the bottom shelf, integrated ash dump, and larger hopper make this grill unbelievably simple to maintain. Finally, our completely new afterburner firepot lets you reach temps up to 1000F and gives you searing power like no other.
product_category: Ace Hardware > Outdoor Living > Grills and Smokers > Pellet Grills

item_name: Gozney Arc and Arc XL Pizza Oven Stand Aluminum 48 in. H X 18 in. W X 18 in. L
full_product_description: The Arc Stand is simple to assemble, built to last and easy to maneuver. Making it easy to add your Arc to any backyard setup. The Arc is a perfect fit for a standard outdoor kitchen countertop. For a more flexible free-standing setup, the Arc Stand is for you. Designed with cooking on the Arc in mind, your oven securely connects to the stand with an easy turn fastener and sits at the perfect height for cooking.
product_category: Ace Hardware > Outdoor Living > Grills and Smokers > Grill Stands/Tables and Shelves

item_name: Recteq SmokeStone 600 Wood Pellet WiFi Pellet Griddle Black/Silver
full_product_description: Introducing the world's first and only wood fired griddle the Recteq smoke stone. The only griddle that adds delicious wood fired smoke flavor to every sizzling bite. Plus, the smoke stone is the only griddle with precise, wi-fi temperature control, so the griddle automatically adjusts the heat to ensure your food cooks evenly and consistently every time. With Recteq's legendary wood fired flavor, stainless steel construction, #1 rated grilling app, and US based customer service, the smoke stone is simply better.
product_category: Ace Hardware > Outdoor Living > Grills and Smokers > Pellet Grills

item_name: Masterbuilt 24 in. Gravity Series 600 Digital Charcoal/Wood Grill and Smoker Black
full_product_description: Bring your charcoal grilling and smoking experience to new heights with Masterbuilt’s Gravity Series 600 Digital Charcoal Grill and Smoker. This revolutionary grill and smoker offers ultimate cooking versatility with the unmatched flavor of charcoal all within the palm of your hands. Simply load up to 12 pounds of lump charcoal or 18lbs of briquette into the GravityFed charcoal hopper, light your fire starter and set your desired cooking temperature on the digital control panel or using the Masterbuilt app. High-heat sear your favorite foods up to 700 deg.F, or use low-and-slow smoking methods to cook for up to 18 hours at 225 deg. F. Additionally, the Gravity Series 600 grill and smoker is accessory-ready  and compatible with the Masterbuilt Pizza Oven or Gravity Series Rotisserie. Master the art of backyard grilling and smoking with Masterbuilt.
product_category: Ace Hardware > Outdoor Living > Grills and Smokers > Charcoal Grills
